title: World Water Day
detail_text: <:th_ch0002/>Hey, You. This is just impossible.... I can’t....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>You can’t do it because you think you can’t. If you believe that you can, you can do anything!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>But that doesn’t mean we have to go dip in the sea! It’s still March, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>It’s March, but it’s World Water Day today. So I thought we could go swimming in the cold, you get me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>“You get me?”, of course not! If it’s World Water Day, then it doesn’t have to be the sea, right? Look, how about hot springs? Hot spring water is water too, no?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>There are no hot springs near here, though.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Then how about public baths?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Public baths have cold baths, don’t they? Isn’t it the same as the sea?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>It’s not! We’re going to a public bath!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Geez~, I guess you can’t be helped, Eli-san. Alright, let’s go to a public bath!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
